import React, { useState } from 'react'; import 'bootstrap/dist/css/bootstrap.min.css'; import axios from 'axios'; const API_BASE_URL = process.env.REACT_APP_API_BASE_URL; const TeacherManagement = () => { const [email, setEmail] = useState(''); const [memberName, setMemberName] = useState(''); const [gender, setGender] = useState('남성'); const [phoneNumber, setPhoneNumber] = useState(''); const [address, setAddress] = useState(''); const [detailAddress, setDetailAddress] = useState(''); const [registrationNumberFront, setRegistrationNumberFront] = useState(''); const [registrationNumberBack, setRegistrationNumberBack] = useState(''); const [teachingLanguage, setTeachingLanguage] = useState(''); const [bankName, setBankName] = useState(''); const [accountNumber, setAccountNumber] = useState(''); const handleSubmit = async () => { const combinedRegistrationNumber = `${registrationNumberFront}-${registrationNumberBack}`; try { const formData = { email, memberName, phoneNumber, gender, address, detailAddress, registrationNumber: combinedRegistrationNumber, teachingLanguage, bankName, accountNumber, }; const response = await axios.post(`${API_BASE_URL}/TeacherCreate`, JSON.stringify(formData), { headers: { 'Content-Type': 'application/json', }, }); if (response.status === 201) { console.log('강사가 성공적으로 생성되었습니다.'); console.log(API_BASE_URL); } toggleModal(); // 모달 닫기 } catch (error) { console.error('강사 생성에 실패했습니다.', error); console.log(API_BASE_URL); } }; return (

강사 관리

{showModal && (
강사 생성
setEmail(e.target.value)} className="form-control" />
setMemberName(e.target.value)} className="form-control" />
setPhoneNumber(e.target.value)} className="form-control" />
setAddress(e.target.value)} placeholder="주소" />
setDetailAddress(e.target.value)} placeholder="상세주소" />
setRegistrationNumberFront(e.target.value)} className="form-control" />
-
setRegistrationNumberBack(e.target.value)} className="form-control" />
setTeachingLanguage(e.target.value)} className="form-control" />
setBankName(e.target.value)} className="form-control" />
setAccountNumber(e.target.value)} className="form-control" />
)} {/* 여기에 강사 정보를 루프로 돌려서 넣으면 돼 */}
강사번호 이름 이메일 전화번호 상세 정보 강의 보기 추가 수업 가능 시간 수당 관리
); }; export default TeacherManagement;
